author: 20 Shallow, Ridiculous Reasons Why People Have Broken Up | Fun Time Viral
title: Comment on 51 Guys And Girls Confess The Most Superficial Reason They Ever Broke Up With Someone by 20 Shallow, Ridiculous Reasons Why People Have Broken Up | Fun Time Viral
text:
http://tvforless.wordpress.com bud8bud3 
Reblogged this on coulditb and commented: I wanted to add an experience of my own. When I was around 18-20 years old I was having a little party at my apartment and, as per usual when you are young & dumb, I had a girl come up to me and say that she would like to “out” with me and of course I said yes. For about 2 minutes she sat in my lap on the chair in the T.V. room. Within a matter of 5 minutes we had moved to the kitchen and sat at the card table. She thought, for some reason, it would be fun to just blurt out “Me and Joe are dating!”. Just as she finished saying the word dating I leaned in and whispered “Yeah, I don’t think this is going to work out”. That was the end of that. http://ohreeallly.com/2016/03/27/20-shallow-ridiculous-reasons-why-people-have-broken-up/ 20 Shallow, Ridiculous Reasons Why People Have Broken Up | Oh Reeallly
